topic.p: Updated virtio-win packages that fix several bugs and add various enhancements are now available.

description.p:
[balloon]evict windows guest free memory does not work
feature request: virtio-serial windows driver has a write size limitation that should be lifted
Poor write I/O performance of virtio-win driver
For virtio-blk driver MSISupported should be turned on by default on VISTA and higher.
virtio-serial CloseHandle & shutdown problems
Crash when running on Windows XP SMP
nic:Network become unavailable in windows 2008 x64 guest when doing netperf test
VirtIo-Serial data corruption when working on Windows XP SMP VM
[WHQL] Windows 2008 R2 guest hang when running job of "DP WLK - Hot-Add - Device Test - Verify driver support for Hot-Add CPU".
BSOD after hot-unplug a virtio-serial port
[WHQL] Win2k8-32 guest always got BSOD (0X93) during balloon testing
fail to attach virtio serial port to guest when use same nr for different virtio serial pci
Windows Guest Tools: RHEV-Serial driver is complaining about signature on Windows7 x86
[WHQL]Windows fails to do S4/S3 with virtio-win-1.1.17
(virtio-win-1.1.17) Can not generate crash dump file after BSOD of Windows guests.
[WHQL] BSOD occurs when running "CHAOS-Concurrent Hardware And OS test"
(virtio-win-1.1.17)Upgrade fails with BSOD when upgrade virtio block driver from version of 1.1.16 to 1.1.17 on windows
[WHQL]Job of "DPWDK-HotReplace-Device Test-Verify driver support for D3 power state" fails with getting BSOD
.git in sources tarball

solution.p:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously-released errata relevant to your system have been applied.
This update is available via the Red Hat Network. Details on how to use the Red Hat Network to apply this update are available at http://kbase.redhat.com/faq/docs/DOC-11259
